title: String Art Gallery
subtitle: Explore examples created with different presets to inspire your own creations

categories.name: Fine Detail
categories.description: High precision with fine lines for detailed images

examples.title: Cat Portrait - Fine Detail
examples.description: A detailed cat portrait using the Fine Detail preset, perfect for capturing intricate facial features and fur textures.

categories.name: Bold Impact
categories.description: Strong lines and high contrast for dramatic effect

examples.title: Cat Portrait - Bold Impact
examples.description: The same cat portrait with bold, dramatic lines that create strong contrast and visual impact.

categories.name: Soft Portrait
categories.description: Gentle lines perfect for portraits and organic shapes

examples.title: Cat Portrait - Soft Portrait
examples.description: A gentle rendering that captures the soft, elegant nature of the subject with subtle line work.

categories.name: Professional
categories.description: Balanced settings optimized for exhibition quality

examples.title: Cat Portrait - Professional
examples.description: Exhibition-quality result with balanced detail and visual impact, perfect for professional displays.

items.title: High Contrast Works Best
items.description: Images with clear differences between light and dark areas produce the most striking string art.

items.title: Experiment with Presets
items.description: The same image can look completely different with various preset settings - try them all!

items.title: Consider Your Display
items.description: Bold Impact works great for wall displays, while Soft Portrait is perfect for intimate settings.
